丘.definition: mound; hillock; grave; classifier for fields

丘八.definition: soldier (from the two components of the 兵 character) (derog.)

丘北.definition: Qiubei county in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao autonomous prefecture 文山壯族苗族自治州|文山壮族苗族自治州[Wen2 shan1 Zhuang4 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

丘北縣.definition: Qiubei county in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao autonomous prefecture 文山壯族苗族自治州|文山壮族苗族自治州[Wen2 shan1 Zhuang4 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

丘吉爾.definition: variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]

丘壑.definition: hills and valleys; remote, secluded area

丘成桐.definition: Shing-Tung Yau (1949-), Chinese-American mathematician, Fields medalist in 1982

丘比特.definition: Cupid, son of Venus and Mars, Roman god of love and beauty

丘爾金.definition: Churkin (name); Vitaly I. Churkin (1952-), Russian diplomat, Ambassador to UN from 2006

丘逢甲.definition: Qiu Fengjia or Ch'iu Feng-chia (1864-1912), Taiwanese Hakkanese poet

丘鷸.definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian woodcock (Scolopax rusticola)
